attributes.action: commit to keeping Islamic Sharia Law out of our legal system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Archbishop of Canterbury Rowan Williams says the adoption of Islamic Sharia law in the UK is "unavoidable". (Source, BBC news, 07.02.2008)

Dr Williams argues that adopting some aspects of Sharia law would help maintain social cohesion.

We the undersigned politely request that the Prime Minister commit to keeping any aspect of Islamic Sharia law out of our legal system.  Our legal system must not reflect any singular faith or degenerate into separate courts for different people.

Those choosing to live in the United Kingdom must choose to live by our laws and our standards.

rejection.details: This is an entirely hypothetical premise.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
